proposal: Navigating the Web3 waters without InsureX is like sailing without a life jacket. Congrats on securing 24 holders in the ETH network with your innovative browser extension that shields wallets from the unseen icebergs of scams and unauthorized transactions. Imagine combining your security prowess with our suite of B2B tools, enabling your community to not only sail safely but also to explore new horizons of DEX, lotteries, and more. Together, we can chart a course for success where everyone has a share of the treasure.
